Class ScenePainter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.johnsproject.jpos.graphics.ScenePainter

  • public class ScenePainter
extends java.lang.Object
    The ScenePainter does drawing work, it draws on the ScenePaint of it's Scene.
    Author:
    John Konrad Ferraz Salomon - John´s Project
